message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it at $1,000,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  While I'm confident this product will bring you significant returns, I can adjust my price to $900,000.  I believe this reflects a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850,000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
